author: TravisEz13
body:
Nightly docker images have not been working for months.  
Removing and cleaning up docs.
If we want to get this working again, we can recreate this.  
The script should be written in PowerShell anyway because we need to support all OSs.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Please update .spelling to fix the test failure. It looks good other than that.

title: Remove nightly docker images
